name: Goreling
senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 7

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) necrotic damage. ++ Reactions
actions.name: Slam

actions.desc: When a goreling is hit but not reduced to 0 hp, it splits into two new gorelings. Each new goreling has 1 hp, doesn’t have this reaction, and is one size smaller than the original goreling.
actions.name: Multiplying

special_abilities.desc: If 6 or more gorelings are within 30 feet of one another, they become frenzied and their attacks deal an extra 2 (1d4) necrotic damage.
special_abilities.name: Bloodthirsty

special_abilities.desc: Up to five gorelings can occupy the same space.
special_abilities.name: Swarming
